text:
@realDonaldTrump @MariaBartiromo So are the numbers of deaths from the Covid19 pandemic

So are the numbers of injured and sickened from the rubber bullets, flash grenades, tear gas and pepper spraying of peaceful protesters

So are the numbers of black people killed and injured by police

INCREDIBLE
